alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Lucia Mountains; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 3:20AM PST until November 08 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 65 mph are possible on the Carrizo Plain. * WHERE...Santa Lucia Mountains, Southern Salinas Valley and San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes Highway 101 and State Route 46. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Lucia Mountains; Southern Salinas Valley
